JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW THURSDAY, THE 10TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 20TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 218 of 2019 CRIME NO. 1067/2017 of Hosdurg Police Station, Kasaragod PETITIONER: PAUL K.A.ANTONY AGED 45 YEARS, S/O LATE ANTONY, MOOVARIKKUND , PADANNAKKAD , KANHANGAD VILLAGE,HOSDURG TALUK. BY ADV. SRI.A.ARUNKUMAR RESPONDENTS: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682031. 2 REJI C.M, AGED 53 YEARS, S/O MARKOSE, MOOVARIKKUND, PADANAKKAD.P.0O, NILESHWAR (VIA), HOSDURG TALUK-671314. 3 RENI C.R. AGED 28 YEARS, S/O.REJI.C.M., MOOVARIKKUND , PADANNAKKAD .P.O, NILESHWAR (VIA), HOSDURG TALUK-671314. BY ADV. SRI.VIPIN T JOSE SENIOR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI C S HRITHWIK THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 10.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ee Crl.MC.No. 218 of 2019 2 2O1MKER/T323 ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioner is the accused in Crime No.1067 of 2017 of Hosdurg Police Station, Kasaragod. He is alleged to have committed the offences under Sections 420 and 465 42=IPC. Respondents 2 and 3 are the victims. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and respondents 2 and 3 and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. TI have perused the affidavits filed by respondents 2 and 3, who have entered appearance through counsel. T am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioner. meee Crl.MC.No. 218 of 2019 3 2019/KERI1323 In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No.1067 of 2017 of Hosdurg Police Station, Kasaragod are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal. Sd/- K.
